title: On Politics
content:
Which is a topic I usually steer well clear of, but I think things would be different if more people dropped their current political allegiances and formed a party like the Party of Citizens Who Have Decided to Think for Themselves and Be Their Own Politicians.
But of course, it could never work, because people don't like to think for themselves... The whole idea of politics is silly. Perhaps the world's only hope is for people to accept parties like the Monster Raving Loony Party.
